alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of northeastern La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 545 PM MST... At 457 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking strong winds ahead of thunderstorms near Lake Havasu City, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parker, Bouse and Buckskin Mountain Park. This includes the following highways... AZ Route 72 between mile markers 14 and 31. AZ Route 95 between mile markers 117 and 146, between mile markers 148 and 154, and between mile markers 156 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
